Home > Services

Services

Dabskic Dredging and Construction [W/A] Limited team has experts related to every area of piling, civil engineering construction, marine and shore protections which enables us to provide complete range of services for projects of any size.

Civil Construction

Complete range of civil engineering and related services to its clients.

Jetty/Wharf

The companyâ€™s capability in this area has been amply demonstrated by special terrain projects undertaken in the Niger Delta region of Nigeria. Special studies and designs to overcome natural constraints have also been undertaken for both private and public sector clients.

Shoreline Protection/Reclamation

Land reclamation, the protection of coasts and shores, are our most visible activities. Our projects contribute to the economic development of the Niger Delta Region. We also welcome and promote healthy relationships with foreign partner in terms of technology, labour workforce and financial ability to ensure the very best end product for our Clients.

Dredging

We carries out the activity in dredging and solving coastal erosion problems through the design and implementation of shore line protection techniques. Our capabilities and approach allow us to execute projects on time and on budget in the logistically challenging terrain of the Niger Delta with a perfect understanding of the environmental and communal sensitivities associated with these demanding areas.

Building Construction

Private houses, school blocks, hospitals, multi-storey public buildings, etc are some of the building projects that Dabskic has undertaken for Clients.

Precast Activities

We carry out precast concrete activities at somewhere and transport them to site or at the project site.

Technical Services

We also undertake the repair of all types of Diesel Fuel Injection Pumps, Injector Nozzles and Overhauling of Complete Engines.
